scripts.install: pnpm --prefix app install && pnpm --prefix api install
scripts.dev: pnpm run --prefix app dev && pnpm run --prefix api start:debug
scripts.build: pnpm run --prefix app build && pnpm run --prefix api build
scripts.start: pnpm run --prefix app preview && pnpm run --prefix api start:prod
scripts.lint: pnpm run --prefix app lint && pnpm run --prefix api lint
scripts.test: pnpm run --prefix app test && pnpm run --prefix api test
